comments.text:
+Mano doido Roubando inscritos? Como que roubam inscritos? Duvido q alguém 
iria trocar barbixas por esse cara, se ele ta conseguindo inscritos, eh pq 
as pessoas querem se inscrever, ninguém ta obrigando o pessoal a ir pro 
canal dele não. E aliás, se ele ta no topo, eh porque conseguiu likes, vai 
reclamar pro pessoal q deu likes pra ele então, ou faz mehor, simplesmente 
o ignore e fique procurando os seus "comentários de qualidade". E outra, eu 
não te xinguei, se vc responder me xingando é uma prova q vc não aguenta 
argumentar como gente civilizada. Não é que eu to defendendo o cara não, 
mas eu respeito que, mesmo se o comentário for retardado, ele chegou no 
topo por ter mais likes, a menos que ele use bots, aí pode denunciar.
comments.author: Toshinou Kyouko

top_comment.text:
Nessa semana chegamos a mais de 400 milhões de visualizações no YouTube em 
6 anos de existência! Nosso muito obrigado a todos que nos acompanham e 
fazem parte dessa história: equipe, convidados e fãs.

O vídeo número 301 do Improvável é o Escolinha Improvável #6!

MC Convidado: Bruno Motta
Jogador Convidado: Allan Benatti
Músico Convidado: Daniel Tauszig

Tema (personagens):
Daniel: agente secreto que tem as mãos imantadas
Allan Benatti: astrólogo que vai se transformando em diversos animais
Elidio (sugestão da plateia): avó do Batman que joga tênis﻿

captions.text:
"Improbable School".
Everybody stand up.

Andy will be the teacher, and
his goal is to guess who they are.

The producers made up characters
and he doesn't know who they are.

Today, Allan will be an 'astrologer
who turns into many animals'.

Daniel will be a 'secret agent
with magnetized hands'.

And Elidio's character
is up to you.
A tennis player granny.

- She's the granny of whom?
- Of Batman!
Batman?

So, she's 'Batman's grandma
and she plays tennis'. Okay?
All right, release Anderson.
"Improbable School" is on air!
The crow has reached the egg.

- How was your weekend?
- I can't tell you, that's classified.

The confluences were good
and everything was fiiiine!

I knitted a belt for my
grandson, but he didn't use it!
That's what I did this weekend.

I'll make a roll call.
Number one.

The name is Bond.
Magneto Bond.

I work in many fields...
Magnetic fields!

- Mister Magneto Bond.
- Yes.

Months ago, there was a huge
inflation in the price of an item...
Yes, martini and olives!

- What?
- Martini and olives!

- No, no.
- Eggs shaken, not stirred.
No, no, no.
Dear Lord...

- I can't tell you the answer,
it's classified. - Okay.

- It's out of my...
- Fine, your grade is zero.

- Zero?
- Zero.

- Zero.
- Zero.

Zero, zero...
Zero, zero...

- Zero, zero...
- Just a zero!

I always wanted to be the
zero-zero-zero.

- Number two!
- Pisces!
Ascendant in Leeeaah...

Mister Pisces... Which city
will host the 2016 Olympics?

Depending on the astral confluence
there could be many cities...

- It's already decided.
- Oh, it's decided.

- You sure?
- Positive.

Really? Because it could change,
depending on the constellations...

Things are shitty and it
could change, but...
Ssssorry, I don't know!
So you got a zero!

- Number three.
- Ask away, ask Odete!
Ask away and I'll win this set!

I'll be nice. You can answer which
city will host the 2016 Olympics.
Gotham City!
The Gotham City Olympics!
My grandson is organizing them!

Oh, that's...
That's not my grandson!

I thought he was my grandson!
Stop pretending you're my grandson!
That's it. Am I right?

- You got a zero.
- 0-15, you're winning.

- Can you guess any of them? - Yes.
Daniel is secret agent Magneto!

He's a secret agent
with magnetized hands.

- Allan is an astrologer who turns
into animals. - Very good.

And Elidio is an old tennis player who
happens to be Batman's grandmother!
You got a 10!

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROVÁVEL
Probably a good show.

- Where's the ball?
- Turn off your forehead, kid!
